features: Summer’s Eve Active daily performance feminine wash removes odor-causing bacteria
A cool boost of freshness for under your arms, breasts, and even in your intimate area gives you an invigorating sensation that helps you feel ready for the day
Active has Acti-Cool, a blend of eucalyptus and peppermint oils give a boost of freshness and gentle enough for your most delicate skin
Summer’s Eve daily performance and feminine body wash is gynecologist tested, free from dyes and parabens, and the product is not tested on animals
Uniquely formulated and pH balanced to match the intimate area’s natural chemistry
body.description: Experience an invigorating cleansing that helps you feel ready every day. A daily intimate care routine that lets you experience that unique everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve Feminine body wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Always pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry and specialized for your active lifestyle. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Active has Acti-Cool, a blend of eucalyptus and peppermint oils give a boost of freshness and gentle enough for your most delicate skin That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care – whether you’re at home or on the go, want fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all, we got you. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Boost of Freshness 2 Removes Odor 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Active Helps to Offset Odor pH-balanced Removes Sweat & Odor Absorbs Moisture Use After Workouts Free from Dyes Free from Parabens Helps to Offset Odor pH-balanced Removes Sweat & Odor Absorbs Moisture Use After Workouts Free from Dyes Free from Parabens

What is unique about Summer's Eve Active Collection? Our Active line is specifically designed for those women whose life is a blur of activity. Whether you’re constantly on the go, an athlete, or are just looking for an intimate care product that can keep pace with your busy life. Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Refreshing no irritation scent is clean and fresh not too strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ok, when it says a cool burst of freshness, it means it. The smell is to die for. It is soft and luxurious when washing with it. The cool part though....it was literally shocking! I wasn't expecting a very apparent cooling feeling across my WHOLE body when I washed with this. I assumed a cool burst of freshness was more like a scent or something stupid. But no, this cool burst is actually a cooling feeling/sensation that is very strong. Now, it's not like Icey hot or anything, but you will definitely feel it. Even my husband liked the feeling lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I prefer this stuff to anything else. I feel it works better and after a long day of working outside or being at the gym, it definitely helps make things fresher.

reviews.reviewerName: This is worth every penny it smells so good and last all day  it’ll be careful you will get complements all day
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Woowwww it smells like peppermint and keeps you fresh all day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The sent it’s good but too strong and I’m a sensitive girl so I don’t use it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes you feel super clean
reviews.reviewText: If you move around a lot either cleaning house, running after toddlers or actually playing sports and sweat a lot THIS is what you need! I have sensitive skin so I used to only use the sensitive version of summers eve, but I gave this a try and works great on my sensitive skin.. you do get a burst of coldness “down there” but it subsides. Works all day I even use it in my underarms after I’ve used soap. Def recommend if you are someone who sweats alot or just wants to feel the freshness all day!Also I’ve used it after I’ve shaved down there and it’s helped to not get any razor burn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I usually hate peppermint flavoring or scent, but this is peppermint scent and will leave you feeling fresh, no matter if you worked out or just sweaty from the heat or have thicker thighs and sweaty no matter what you do and cant stop being sweaty in that area. Fells cooling and refreshed, but if you have irritation from shaving or from yeast then you will have a slight burning sensation but afterwards it will be numbed from the peppermint and will have a relief from the itching. I have irritation from shaving but I'm enjoying the coolness from the peppermint. defiantly getting more in the near future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cooling feeling is no joke
reviews.reviewText: I love the fragrance of this body wash, however, the cooling sensation is not my favorite. I probably won’t purchase again based on that, but I will try another body wash of the same brand that doesn’t have that cooling sensation.
Summer's Eve is my go-to brand for feminine cleansing wash. This is my first time trying the Active Cooling, but it's really nice to use with the cooling minty feel.
